concept.title: Microsoft To Do — User manual
concept.shortdesc: Key features and basic actions for individual users.

conbody.p: Microsoft To Do helps you create tasks, set reminders, and manage lists across devices.

ul.li: Sign in with your Microsoft account.

ol.li: Type a task name and press Enter.
Optionally set Due date, Reminder, or Repeat.

ul.li: Select a task to open its details and change fields such as steps, due date, and notes.
To remove a task, open the context menu and choose Delete.
Create a new list from New list and move tasks into it.
Mark a task complete by selecting the circle next to its name.
Can’t sign in? Use Microsoft’s sign-in helper.
503 error on web: try another network or check corporate restrictions.
